content.question: Which of the following would decrease the amount of the reactant <math alttext="C O, gas" overflow="scroll"> <mi>CO</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>g</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> </math> in the container?

choices.label: Adding <math alttext="C H 3 O H, gas" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>CH</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mspace width="-0.1em"></mspace><mi>OH</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math> to the container

Removing <math alttext="H 2, gas" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mi>g</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math> from the container
